Title: Permits certain judges, justices and support magistrates to carry a firearm, rifle, or shotgun in a sensitive location
Summary: Permits certain judges, justices and support magistrates to carry a firearm, rifle, or shotgun in a sensitive location.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to permitting certain judges, justices and support magistrates to carry a firearm, rifle, or shotgun in a sensitive location
